entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow squalls over northwestern sections. Local amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Snow squalls over northwestern sections this evening. Local amount 2 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
